channel.title: Getting Started on Check Point CloudGuard Network Security Workshop - AWS GWLB
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Check Point CloudGuard Network Security Workshop - AWS GWLB

item.title: Page 2
item.description: Page 2 Welcome In this workshop you will learn how to deploy Check Point CGNS with AWS Gateway load balancer as well as architecture options to support 3 different traffic flows: outbound, east-west, and inbound. Learning Objectives Deploy Cloud9 as an IDE for completing workshop exercises. How DevOps patterns help to release features and functionality faster. Best practices for implementing 2 pizza team pipelines.
